comment.author: 24216670@N07
comment._content: It is possible that the woman on the right is my great-grandmother, Louise R. Hoocker. She acted as translator and companion to Mrs. Einstein when they were in California. Here are some photos for comparison: www.flickr.com/photos/24216670@N07/6962532302/in/photostream www.flickr.com/photos/24216670@N07/7108609687/in/photostream

comment.author: 50901443@N05
comment._content: The woman on the left is my aunt, Phyllis Pinney Jeffrey Eoff with my grandfather, Warren Pinney. The woman on the far right is my grandmother, Luella Pinney. Thank you, Patty Pinney Gibson ppg1717@yahoo.com
